name: Trainocate
description: Trainocate is a leading learning and development service provider company, delivering training in critical career competencies such as Analytics, Artificial Intelligence, Big Data, Cloud Computing, Data Science, Dev Ops, Machine Learning and more. These Training and Certifications programmes are created and developed by leading technology conglomerates such as Amazon (AWS), Cisco, Google (GCP), IBM, Microsoft, NetApp, Red Hat, Trend Micro and VMware and many others. We at Trainocate are proud to have helped thousands of professionals and companies in building competencies in current and emerging areas. We further solidify them through inhouse assessment tools followed by industry-recognized certifications, thus increasing your company’s credibility and market value of your employees.
features: Assess knowledge before and after training
business_objectives: Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: Advocate Educate Innovate
ShortDescription: Trainocate is India’s largest IT and human capability development training provider.

Highlights.name: Experiential Learning
Highlights.description: Experiential Learning Program offers you an open field for exploration, enabling learners to future-proof their skillsets and avoid becoming outdated

Highlights.name: Remote Labs
Highlights.description: Remote labs labs can be customized for classroom or an e-Learning environment and is housed in a secure location and available at any time.

Highlights.name: Testing Center
Highlights.description: TRAINOCATE provides you with the convenience of taking your certification exams

enhanced_description: Trainocate is a leading learning and development service provider based in India, specializing in IT and human capability development. They deliver comprehensive training and industry-recognized certification programs across critical technology competencies such as Analytics, Artificial Intelligence, Big Data, Cloud Computing, Data Science, Dev Ops, and Machine Learning. These programs are developed in partnership with major technology conglomerates including Amazon (AWS), Cisco, Google (GCP), IBM, Microsoft, NetApp, Red Hat, Trend Micro, and VMware. Trainocate helps organizations build and future-proof their workforce's skillsets, utilizing in-house assessment tools to measure knowledge before and after training. A core objective is to reduce the cost of hiring qualified employees by upskilling existing staff, thereby increasing company credibility and employee market value. The platform features an Experiential Learning Program and customizable remote labs accessible anytime in a secure location, supporting both classroom and e-Learning environments. Additionally, Trainocate provides testing centers for certification exams, with features like easy question bank management and restrictions on user navigation during assessments to ensure integrity.
key_use_cases: Reducing External Hiring Needs by Developing Internal Talent
competitive_advantages: Partnerships with leading technology conglomerates (e.g., AWS, GCP, Microsoft) for curriculum development and certifications.
Comprehensive solution offering training, in-house assessments, and facilitation of industry-recognized certifications.
Focus on future-proofing skillsets through experiential learning.
Flexible remote labs customizable for various learning environments (classroom/e-learning).
Features for ensuring assessment integrity (e.g., restricting user navigation).
Convenience of integrated testing centers for certification exams.
implementation_scenarios: Classroom-based training with remote lab access
hr_functions_supported: Talent Acquisition (indirectly, by enabling internal skill fulfillment)
roi_benefits: Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
primary_users: IT Professionals (as the target audience for technical training)
security_features: Remote labs housed in a secure location
Restrict user navigation from window (during assessments)
